md:
giải nghĩa từ "logistics" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

Logistics /lɒˈdʒɪstɪks/ (n)

* Từ loại: danh từ
* Nghĩa tiếng việt: hậu cần, vận tải, cung ứng

Logistics refers to the planning, coordination, and execution of the movement and storage of goods, products, and resources from one place to another.

* Ví dụ: The company's logistics team worked tirelessly to ensure that all products were delivered on time.
* Từ liên quan: supply chain, transportation, inventory, warehouse, distribution.

Logistics can also refer to the management of the flow of things between the point of origin and the point of consumption in order to meet the requirements of customers or corporations.

* Ví dụ: The new logistics system helped the company to reduce costs and improve efficiency.
* Từ liên quan: management, supply chain, operations, procurement.

In a military context, logistics refers to the planning and execution of the movement and supply of troops, equipment, and materials.

* Ví dụ: The general was responsible for the logistics of the military operation.
* Từ liên quan: military, strategy, tactics, operation, supply.

In general, logistics involves the integration of information, transportation, inventory, warehousing, material handling, and packaging to achieve efficient and effective delivery of products or services.

* Ví dụ: The company's logistics strategy focused on reducing transportation costs and improving delivery times.
* Từ liên quan: strategy, operations, management, supply chain, transportation.
